equipment: Oxford Cryosystems open-flow N2 gas cryostat
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: degassed under high dynamic vacuum (10-10 bar)
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Desolvated MFM-300(VIII) was obtained after degassing.

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: heated under a flow of He
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Desolvated MFM-300(VIV) was obtained after heating and used for breakthrough experiments.

synthesis_conditions.equipment: Beamline ID22 of European Synchrotron Radiation Facility (ESRF)
synthesis_conditions.time: Rapid scans (~8 mins each) and a long scan of 1.5 h
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: heated at 120 °C for ~3 h under high vacuum (10-6 mbar)
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Structure solved using TOPAS Academic and Rietveld refinement.
